title: Roku Up 5%; Makes Apple TV App Available to Users
text:
By Michael Dabaie

Roku Inc. (ROKU) shares rose 5% to $125.06 in early trading.

The TV streaming company said Apple Inc.'s (AAPL) Apple TV app is available on the Roku platform starting Tuesday.

Roku users can add the Apple TV app via the Roku Channel Store, including accessing their iTunes video library and subscribing to Apple TV channels directly on Roku devices. Starting Nov. 1, Apple TV+ will be available on the Apple TV app on the Roku platform, Roku said.
